title: Constructivist Game-Based Mathematics Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Focuses on enhancing math education design competencies for in-service elementary teachers and education specialists by integrating gamification mechanisms with constructivist learning principles.

learning_goals: Learners can apply constructivist learning design principles to game elements to develop math problem-solving scenarios.
Learners can model learners’ cognitive processes in games using the Cognitive Walkthrough technique and establish evaluation criteria.
Learners can design and prototype game-based math learning modules in a collaborative digital environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
